data.name: Chairman A-Class Award
data.description: Top performance employee. The first in Machine Learning team and the youngest in KBTG to receive this award.

data.name: Winner
data.description: Identified characteristics of potentially default credit card customers and proposed solutions to prevent credit approval for credit card applicants that obtain such characteristics.

data.name: 2nd Runner Up
data.issuer: The Second NIDA Business Analytics and Data Science Contest
data.description: Analyzed consumer survey data and identified consumer segments for different insurance schemes.

data.name: Special Prize
data.description: Proposed methodology to classify news categories from its body.

data.name: Winner
data.issuer: Click2Win at Krungsri Securities League Competition 2016
data.description: Earned highest return in TFEX market (+20.51 %NAV Change) and earned 2nd highest return in SET market (+14.08 %NAV Change).
